FlightPath Academics, at your request, can confirm what information we hold about you and how it is processed.
In order for FlightPath Academics to provide users with access to our advising, student success, or faculty activities software, we must collect and retain data relating to student courses, grades, etc., as well as faculty information and data.
We provide hosting and support on cloud-based environments, as well as custom software development and customization for all of our products.

This Privacy Policy tells you how we, FlightPath Academics, will collect and use your personal & student data to provide our service which allows faculty, staff, administrators and students of Higher Education, to access the various features of our software offerings (eg, FlightPath, Faculty Atlas, etc).
